duties_responsibilities.duty: Oversee the operation of a branch office with emphasis on deposits and customer service activities.
Provide personnel management for branch staff and oversee branch office operations.
Maintain knowledge of branch policies, approve checks and overrides, and handle customer problems and complaints.
Represent the financial institution in public relations activities and community affairs.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent work experience. Knowledgeable of laws and regulations applicable to bank lending and operations practices.
